About Churchs Fried Chicken Store Number 30 Churchs Fried Chicken Store Number 30 is a Fast Food restaurant located at 2200 Gulfway Dr in Port Arthur, TX . Churchs Fried Chicken Store Number 30 has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
